title: Rapha teases “fastest ever” TT Aerosuit for Giro d’Italia & colorful Ltd EF switch-out kit
content:
The 2021 Giro d’Italia is set to kick off this weekend and Rapha has a couple of tricks up their sleeve to outfit the EF Pro Cycling team. Developed over the past two years, Rapha has a new TT Aerosuit that claims to be their fastest-ever time trial skinsuit – not bad since the current […]

The post Rapha teases “fastest ever” TT Aerosuit for Giro d’Italia & colorful Ltd EF switch-out kit appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
